title: Adding an elseif Block
description:
Like the last problem, decide if a number is positive, negative, or zero. Only this time you won't use a nested if-else block, you will use the elseif block with an expression instead.

if value > 0
elseif true
else
end
hint: The program already finds a positive number so add an elseif block to the if else block. Then add the output blocks for the elseif scope and the else scope. Then run the program with the value variable having a value of -2, 0, and 2 to test your program.
